subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hey guys--Another Box
author: dave vacknitz
full_text:
Hay Steve i uploaded a few of the ones i already had
cut, ill do more when i get a chance. let me know what
yah think of them.

Dave (vinnie)


--- Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:

> 
> New Box from Rob showed up today, the Speakjet #4. 
> I was planning on 
> taking the day off from this, but i got sucked right
> back in again.  
> The files are a bit rough sounding, i was moving
> around a lot but got 
> some good files.  I'm only 2 minutes into a 8 minute
> session, but i 
> need to eat and sleep.  I posted what i got so far,
> i didn't want to 
> let Rob down by getting it and not posting files
> from it the same day.  
> That's not my style, i appreciate him doing that for
> me and hope to get 
> much more from it as i experiment.  Remember
> deadscience.com is where 
> to go for more info on the speakjet boxes.
> 
> -Steve H.
> 
>
